alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Pennington Co Plains; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 4:28AM MST until January 21 at 8:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Ice accumulations up to a few hundredths of an inch. Little or no snow accumulation. * WHERE...Ziebach County, the Pennington County Plains, Haakon County and Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation and the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...A light coating of ice will form on roads and bridges and make travel hazardous. Sidewalks, steps, and driveways will be very slippery.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Jackson; Pennington Co Plains; Ziebach
